channel.title: Personal on ZORRILLA.ME
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on ZORRILLA.ME

item.title: Soon
item.description: Howdy! Welcome to my personal website. For now you can drop at the About Me section to find out who am I. Soon I’ll post some stuff I’m working on as well as some ramblings. Thanks for stopping by!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there. I’m Gabriel, a 37 year old guy from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I’m a Business Intelligence Analyst, freelance web developer, IT Engineering undergrad and husband. This website is an escape of my ideas and projects. Through the years I setup a couple of websites but never stuck with them. This time I won’t send the site to oblivion as it’s being hosted on GitHub Expect some table top RPG, IOT and domotics/home automation, stuff as well as some BI and bits of things I may find useful for a broad spectrum of people.
